Previous studies have shown that the rate of branching in the speciation regime increases with population size and mutation rate consistent with the phase diagram ( Sasaki and Haraguchi, 2000; Koelle et al., 2011). Bedford et al. (2012) have used large-scale individual-based simulations to explore structure of influenza viruses phylogenies.
